document.full_text: most pregnant women in the u.s. use at least one prescription or over-the-counter medication -- even though the safety of those drugs during pregnancy is not always clear, a new study finds.
document.title: more u.s. women using medications during pregnancy
lines_and_colors: most pregnant women in the u.s. use at least one prescription or over-the-counter medication -- even though the safety of those drugs during pregnancy is not always clear, a new study finds.
